intro.html:
Welcome to The Plaguers

This game is build for LD56. It's a tower defence like game and it's your goal to defend against swarms of tiny creatures.

You can rate the game on LDJam

intro.text: It's not a week ago that the sky darkend, cold air blew in and critters crawled from the ground.
It brought illness and plagues. An invasion. But with the help of you, we devised demonic firey machines.

outro.text: Not even YOU could keep darkness at bay. I'm the last. And all that was left for me...
was to set FIRE, to all
